name: Animail
description:
Deliver mail throughout the a forest as a sheep!

Press [F] for fullscreen!

How to Play

INTERACT | Left Click 

JUMP | Space Bar or Up Arrow or Right Mouse Click

Hotkeys

[R key] - Restart the level 

[M key] - Toggle mute 

[P key] - Toggle paused 

[Q key] - Quit to menu select 

[F key] - Toggle fullscreen

Info

This is a sequel to my 2013 game "How The Wilderness Whispers" with all new levels, features, collectables, bonuses etc.

I always felt like the original game missed the mark by quite a margin, but still had lots of potential...

I hope you like it!
